title: #166 - YouTube Removes iDubbbz Content Cop
description:
On this episode of The H3 Podcast the gang discuss YouTube's big new policy announcement (spoiler: it's confusing and pleasing to absolutely no one)! We also discuss Harvey Weinstein faking an injury, debate if Hila is a POC, dunk on Keemstar, look a giant penis fish, and a whole lot more!
  YouTube blog about the policy change
  Clownstar
  Picture of Weinstein with a walker
  Penis Fish
